summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Mayor's Reorganization project amending Seattle Municipal Code SS 20.88.020, 20.88.040, 20.88.050 and Ordinance 107252 SS 2, 4 and 5, and Ordinance 105934 S 2, and 107007 S 2, to substitute "Director of Administrative Services" for "Superintendent of Buildings", and to correct errors and omissions of Ordinance 109128.
